/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/25.5/cuda/12.9/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler  -D_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 -O3 -std=c++14 -arch=sm_80 -rdc=true -Xcompiler -fopenmp -pthread -lcudadevrt "--generate-code=arch=compute_80,code=[compute_80,sm_80]" -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink --options-file CMakeFiles/gknng.dir/deviceObjects1.rsp -o CMakeFiles/gknng.dir/cmake_device_link.o --options-file CMakeFiles/gknng.dir/deviceLinkLibs.rsp
